_header: There was a friar of the order gray / Inducas
_description: The Friar and the Nun — eight couplets with interlinear refrain, ‘Inducas…in temptacionibus’, and burden ‘Inducas Inducas / in temptacionibus’

CULAdd7350.First Lines:
Ther was a frier of order grayInducaswhich loued a
                    Nunne full meny a dayIn temptacionibusThis fryer was lusty
                    proper and yongInducasHe offerd the Nunne to lerne her
                        syngin temptacionibus…
CULAdd7350.Last Lines:
…Thus the fryer lyke a prety manInducasOfte rokkyd
                    the Nunnys QuoniamIn temptacionibus
